attributes.action: Introduce a system of reduced road tax for those who pay to off-set their vehicle's carbon emissions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems logically unfair that some people pay to off-set their vehicle's carbon emissions, on an annual basis, and yet they still have to pay the full road-fund licence amount which has been imposed specifically because of the emissions of vehicles. Some people may pay anything up to £50 a year because their consciences tell them they should, yet there is no encouragement from the government to do so. A system of discounted road tax for those who can prove they have paid an appropriate sum of money (to a government approved body) to off-set their vehicle's carbon emissions would encourage more people to do so thereby, over time, helping to counter the damage their vehicles have caused.

Even a discount of £10 per annum - which could be introduced on-line via verification codes - might be enough to encourage more people to off-set their carbon emissions.
